Flow.description:
Copy IDF summary to patent - Garrett 2023-05-04 Updated instruction for case and made Send to OC as default - Kiran 15-04-2021 Updated PFS to Search in instruction for case - kiran 26-03-2021 Approve and send to Ic and Oc screen- kiran 23-02-2021 Copy fields from Disclosure to Patent - Shah 01/11/2021 Copy Secondary Field in Keyword Association from IDF to Patent - Dharshan [10/03/2021]
Added Sharing rule only for ip legal - Asma on 8-04-2020 Changed Subject line for 'NMI' & 'Patent search' as per the ticket- SYMSER-707 -By Asma on 04-03-2020 Added Created from Disclosure Review Condition
Renamed "Approve" to "Approve for filing"; fix grammar from "Requested for More Information" to "Request More Information"; change "Hold" to "IP Legal Review."
Changed the Font of Approve and IP Legal Review. 15/4/2020
Managing Segment copy to patent - 23/6/2020
Funding Source copy to Patent object - 24/6/2020 Checking Active inventor before share
Email sent to OC upon status change - Deepika updated disclosure status - kiran 17-02-21 created patent share with oc - kiran 18-02-21 Deploying to Prod sai 19-03-21
Grammatical changes from Lindha(Changing only the labels) on the Law Firm, Outside Counsel spelling Change and Add a Text. - Tejas(2021-04-07)

formulas.name: DPTitle
formulas.expression: "Defensive Publication by UHG IP Legal - " & TEXT(TODAY())

formulas.name: noteTitle
formulas.expression: "More Info Requested by UHG IP Legal - " & TEXT(TODAY())

formulas.name: RPSTitle
formulas.expression: "Request Patent Search by UHG IP Legal - " & TEXT(TODAY())

textTemplates.name: emailToOC
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!selectedOC.Name},

A new disclosure titled {!scurrentIDF.SymphonyIPM__Title__c}, has been assigned to you. You can view the patent record and associated disclosure here. A to-do item for application drafting has been added to your dashboard. You can access the document upload screen from your dashboard.

First Filing Country: {!FirstFilingCountryName}

Filing Type: {!Case_Type}

Instruction for Case: {!Instruction_for_Case}

Target Filing Date: {!vTargetDateString}

Additional Instructions: {!Instruction_for_Outside_Counsel}

You can click here to access the document upload screen.

While replying to this mail, please ensure that {!CCEmailID} is always copied and the subject line contains the Docket Number.

Regards,
{!EmailSenderUsername}
